move(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.gigabiteconomy.sprites.tiled.MovingSprite
Method to handle general MovingSprite movement Attacks if boolean set and moves the sprite in direction of directionMoving Implementation notes: -> setNextDirection() abstract method defines path of MovingSprite -> Can be extended by overriding and calling super on this method -> When a sprite is moving, two Tiles are occupied.
